channel.title: CVE Feed for Evergreen Content Poster -- Evergreen Content Poster – Auto Post and Schedule Your Best Content to Social Media
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Evergreen Content Poster -- Evergreen Content Poster – Auto Post and Schedule Your Best Content to Social Media

item.title: CVE-2023-41127|2024-08-02T18:54:04.004Z -- evergreen%20content%20poster -- evergreen%20content%20poster%20%E2%80%93%20auto%20post%20and%20schedule%20your%20best%20content%20to%20social%20media
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Evergreen Content Poster Evergreen Content Poster – Auto Post and Schedule Your Best Content to Social Media allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Evergreen Content Poster – Auto Post and Schedule Your Best Content to Social Media: from n/a through 1.3.6.1.
